titleStmt.title: The life and death of that matchless mirrour of magnanimity, and heroick vertues Henrietta Maria de Bourbon Queen to that blessed King and martyr Charles the First: and mother to that most magnificent monarch Charles the Second, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c.

The life and death of that matchless mirrour of magnanimity, and heroick vertues Henrietta Maria de Bourbon Queen to that blessed King and martyr Charles the First: and mother to that most magnificent monarch Charles the Second, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Speed, near the Inner Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Running title: 'The life and death of H. Maria Q. of England'.
Includes marginal notes and three final advertisement leaves.
Incorrectly identified as Wing (2nd ed.) L1994A on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1992.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Henrietta Maria, Queen, consort of Charles I, King of England,
